name: Interview Coach
description: Ace any interview — FAANG, startups, or anything in between
description_zh: 搞定任何面试 — 大厂、创业公司、或任何你想去的地方
author: openclaw0205

faq.q: Can this really help me get into FAANG?
faq.q_zh: 这真的能帮我进大厂吗？
faq.a: We've distilled patterns from thousands of successful interviews. You'll practice with realistic scenarios, get instant feedback, and build the muscle memory that turns nervous candidates into confident ones.
faq.a_zh: 我们从数千次成功面试中提炼了模式。你将用真实场景练习，获得即时反馈，并建立将紧张的候选人变成自信的人的肌肉记忆。

faq.q: What types of interviews does this cover?
faq.q_zh: 这涵盖哪些类型的面试？
faq.a: Behavioral (STAR method), system design, coding interviews, case studies, salary negotiation — the full stack of interview skills.
faq.a_zh: 行为面试（STAR 方法）、系统设计、编程面试、案例分析、薪资谈判——面试技能全栈。
